vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.18; married to Mered (H4778)(?);
mother of: Jered (H3382H), Heber (H2268I) and Jekuthiel (H3354)
§ adj f
1) the Jewess
Jehudijah = Jewess
n pr f
2) (CLBL) a Calebite, the wife of one named Ezra
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hitp.   declararse a uno mismo judío
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 猶太女子 (代上 4:17)
2) 欽定本將該字譯為人名 Jehudijah
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 犹太女子 (代上 4:17)
2) 钦定本将该字译为人名 Jehudijah
